metadata.description:
This token gives you lifetime access to the Pulse app.

Pulse is an NFT portfolio and analytics mobile app to help NFT holders understand their performance and find new opportunities to invest in NFTs and deal with everything that is relevant to it. The app supports both iOS and Android platforms.

As a Pulse member you will participate in the development of the project by suggesting features and voting what to build and when.

This token is a collectible that lives on the Ethereum blockchain.

Learn more on https://nftpulse.app/
metadata.name: Pulse Angel Pass #1
